dmca.title: Intellectual Property Infringement - Please disable site immediately
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Gail Mercer [mailto:gmercer@janarps.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, July 26, 2006 1:21 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Intellectual Property Infringement - Please disable site
immediately
Subject: Intellectual Property Infringement - Please disable site
immediately


 
 
 
July  26 , 2006
 
Prior Notice send on July 20, 2006
 
 
ThePlanet.com
Attn:   George Peletes
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
 
 
VIA EMAIL
 
            RE:  Copyright Infringement Claim
                   
Dear Sirs:
 
You are hereby put on notice for the copyright infringement of your
client, www.yourtrader.biz <http://www.yourtrader.biz>   (aka
www.yourtrader.org) .  This website is listing my proprietary,
copyrighted materials on his website for sale.  I own the copyrights.
At no time, past, present or future, have I given www.yourtrader.biz
<http://www.yourtrader.biz>  or its webmaster the right to sale,
advertise, reproduce, or copy my work.  Since I have not given
www.yourtrader.biz <http://www.yourtrader.biz>   the right to sell,
advertise, reproduce, or copy my work, I have a good faith belief that
the material is not legal.
 
Although initally it appears the domain is hosted by eNom, Inc., the
site uses eNom, Inc. for the name and the site is hosted you.  Please
see Attachment C.
 
Please immediately disable this site and advise your client to remove
these copyrighted works from his website before activating his site
again.  Failing to do so will result in immediate litigation and
injunction against you and the owner of www.yourtrader.biz.
 
Additionally, the works published on the site, www.yourtrader.biz, is
prohibited by your own Intellectual Property Infringement Policy, as
published online, which states:

"Intellectual Property Infringement Policy
 
Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or
otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work
that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet
has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the
extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.
 
The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the
Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law."
 

Jan Arps' Traders' Toolbox did not authorize any of this site to use,
copy, or sale any of the Jan Arps' Traders' Toolbox products.
Specifically, the tools are:
 
Jan Arps Swing/Day Trader's Tool Kit for Tradestation
Jan Arps TT6 Alpha Centauri for Tradestation
Jan Arps TT6 TFM Tradestation
Jan Arps' Crown Jewels for Esignal.com
Jan Arps Canopus for Tradestation
Jan Arps Hurst Polynomial Regression Bands ToolKit for Tradestation
 
The Jan Arps' Traders' Toolbox indicators are protected by copyright
notices on our own site, within the documentation, within the code, and
on the authorized eSignal site.
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages are not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.
 
I swear under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code,
Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is
accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
These copyrighted works should be removed immediately and/or access to
this site disabled.  The webmaster of the infringing site can be reached
via E-mail at yourtrader@yourtrader.biz
<mailto:yourtrader@yourtrader.biz>  .
 
Under the penalty of perjury, all information in this notice is accurate
and I am  authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed.  Please inform me when this site has been
disabled at  gmercer@janarps.com.
 
Sincerely,
Jan Arps
President
Jan Arps' Traders' Toolbox
 
 
 
Attachments:
 
 
 
A - Whois.Net for yourtrader.biz
 
B - Whois.Net for Name-Services.com

Attachment C:
 
 The reason that IP came back is because the domain name uses eNom's DNS
service. The domain is redireced to www.yourtrader.org
<http://www.yourtrader.org> , which redirects to IP 70.85.214.194, which
the whois for is below:
